Text.val: 05.08.2013 SH SCR18322 BXA012D: Changed BPH127.PI.COUNTRY = blank to ADMN_COUNTRYCODE
01.05.2012 GB SCR17307 Changed tests from (RO,PL) in (RO,WAW) in the BXA012F
05.07.2011 SH SCR16583 BXA012F Replaced tests on GNRL_CODE by CLNT203_OFFICE
23.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
10.11.2010 GB SCR15959 Concatenated ACCD_LINENO 1 and 2 and 3 to one string in
23.10.2010 GB SCR15786 Extended comment (BXA012H/3. TEG) with
-- In country PL they use always blank (=CHR(32)) as thousand separators
which has to be changed to . (=full stop) for "KON" reports, because SAG
cannot calculate subtotals with blanks in amounts (stylesheet problem!)
-- Convert input parameter (all of them are optional)
-- Remember starting language (system language is switched to report language)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
In poland always blank will be used as thousand separator for amounts. The
stylesheets from SAG which have to calculate subtotals, does not work
correctly with this separator. Therefore the separator has to be changed
from blank (=chr(32)) to . (full stop) in the magic.ini and back to blank
if the program finished the report.
-- Change thousand separator back to original value
-- Finally set REPA_BANKID = 0 and end the transaction
@Info. If append file fails in GB730, GB730 turns the current job to MSGW, so no
error handling is required in BXA012
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
... copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile is copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Set <textcd> (conversion of special XML chars not necessary because CDATA)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(18,2)), cast(sum(INVA_ACTARETENTION) as decimal(18,2)), cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(18,2)) from :1/INVO, :1/INVA where INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' and INVO_ADMNO = :3 and INVO_CLNTNO = :4 and INVO_AACTUALI <0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE <> 0 for fetch only

Text.val: -- End of Building string with all CLNT102_CLNTNO
-- ACCD_DESCRIPTION of line 1,2,3 / 4,5,6 / .... have to be concatenated to one

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('The TEG over the period from')&' '&DStr (BOM ({3,5}),'DD.MM.YYYY')&' '&MlsTrans ('until')&' '&DStr ({3,5},'DD.MM.YYYY')&' '&IF ({13,2}>1,Trim ({13,1})&' ','')&MlsTrans ('was:')&' '&Trim (Str ({0,1},'N3.4'))&' '&'%'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CLNT where CLNT105_INTRST_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT105_INTRST_CLNTNO = :3 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2
select CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where CLNT105_INTRST_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT105_INTRST_CLNTNO = :3 and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 order by CLNT102_CLNTNO
